Subscription.Query: <!-- For access right constants see: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa392710(v=vs.85).aspx --> <QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security">*[System[EventID=4662]] and *[EventData[Data[@Name='ObjectServer'] = 'WMI']] and *[EventData[band(Data[@Name='AccessMask'], 32)]]</Select> <!-- WBEM_REMOTE_ACCESS = 32 --> <Suppress Path="Security"> <!-- Suppress common system activity --> *[EventData[Data[@Name='AdditionalInfo2']='root\cimv2:Select * from __ClassProviderRegistration']] or *[EventData[Data[@Name='AdditionalInfo2']='root\cimv2:references of {__Win32Provider.Name="CIMWin32"}']] or *[EventData[Data[@Name='AdditionalInfo2']='root\cimv2:references of {__Win32Provider.Name="WmiPerfClass"}']] or *[EventData[Data[@Name='AdditionalInfo2']='root\cimv2:__Win32Provider.Name="WmiPerfClass"']] or *[EventData[Data[@Name='AdditionalInfo2']='root\cimv2:__win32provider.name="cimwin32"']] </Suppress> </Query> </QueryList>
